meanings.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise.
meanings.sent1: Her skills in painting are exceptional.
meanings.sent2: He has developed his cooking skills over the years.
meanings.sent3: Using her skills in baking, she made a cake that looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His skills in negotiation are like a finely tuned instrument.
meanings.sent5: The magician amazed the audience with his incredible skills.

meanings.sent1: His communication skills are crucial in his job.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her problem-solving skills during the project.
meanings.sent3: With his skills in mimicry, he could imitate anyone perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in playing the piano are like magic to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The detective used his investigative skills to solve the mystery.
